line.comment: * Jump to the sector of a given object; this script guarantees, that even bigger wings will jump to a gate in reasonable time, in contrary to all other vanilla scripts
* LU Update (Solarahawk): remove player-related code
* Get sector, in which object to jump at is in

line.text: 'Jump aborted, no valid target object specified for jumping'

line.comment: * End script, if object is in the same sector as THIS and no neighbourhood jump is to be made

line.text: 'Jump aborted, is in same sector as target object'

line.comment: * Check for jump requirements
* If all checks passed (no jump error), we have jump clearance

line.text: '%sCheck passed, jumping approved. Object %s is not in same sector as %s, now jumping!'
'%sCheck passed, jumping approved. %s is in sector %s now jumping to sector %s!'

line.comment: * Undock, if necessary, break operation, if still not in space after trying to undock
* NPCs get their energy for free
* Save state before setting commands and destination
* Set commands and destination
* Search for bestgate (if no safe position was found -> neighbourhood jump only)
* If target object is docked, get position of the ship/station the object is docked (if an object is docked, we always get 0,0,0 as position)
* Jump to nearest gate from object
* IS
* OOS
* No gate found (gateless sectors), or neighbourhood jump
* Jump in neighbourhood of an object (if a safe position was found)
* If a hood jump had to be done, and no safe position around the object was found, set position directly to object (and let's hope game engine prevents collisions)
* Get coordinates of object
* Reassign old commands and destination

line.text: 'Jump FAILED, target object sector NOT reached'

sval.val: Cmd.Anarkis.Jump
Jump aborted, no valid target object specified for jumping
Jump aborted, is in same sector as target object
%sCheck passed, jumping approved. Object %s is not in same sector as %s, now jumping!
%sCheck passed, jumping approved. %s is in sector %s now jumping to sector %s!
Jump aborted, could not undock
Hood jump failed, object not valid
Jump OK, target object sector reached
Jump FAILED, target object sector NOT reached
Jump to the sector of a given object; this script guarantees, that even bigger wings will jump to a gate in reasonable time, in contrary to all other vanilla scripts
LU Update (Solarahawk): remove player-related code
Get sector, in which object to jump at is in
End script, if object is in the same sector as THIS and no neighbourhood jump is to be made
Check for jump requirements
If all checks passed (no jump error), we have jump clearance
Undock, if necessary, break operation, if still not in space after trying to undock
NPCs get their energy for free
Save state before setting commands and destination
Set commands and destination
Search for bestgate (if no safe position was found -> neighbourhood jump only)
If target object is docked, get position of the ship/station the object is docked (if an object is docked, we always get 0,0,0 as position)
Jump to nearest gate from object
No gate found (gateless sectors), or neighbourhood jump
Jump in neighbourhood of an object (if a safe position was found)
If a hood jump had to be done, and no safe position around the object was found, set position directly to object (and let's hope game engine prevents collisions)
Get coordinates of object
Reassign old commands and destination
